modShortDescription: Prepare your food in bowls and re use them later on.
modDescription:
Prepare your [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) in bowls and re use them later on.

## Changelog

Updated to remove the extra rubbish.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/Valmar-Modlets/tree/master/Valmars%20Reuseable%20Cooking%20Bowls)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20079-valmars-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Valmar](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/valmar/), [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
